name: @snowytime/xmlify
description: Super simple xml <-> json builder and parser for making multi language apis more fun to play with

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.mjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && npm run add_package_json
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto patch' && git push origin master && npm version patch && npm publish && echo 'Successful Patch'
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto minor' && git push origin master && npm version minor && npm publish && echo 'Successful Minor Release'
scripts.release:major: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'auto major' && git push origin master && npm version major && npm publish && echo 'Successful Major Release'

author: snowytime
